title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Holidays Open House
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar     Holidays Open House              Event: Holidays Open House          Â       Date: TBA - usually held the second Friday of December At the Bear Valley Visitor Center Point Reyes National Seashore, Cordell Bank National Marine Sanctuary, Tomales Bay and Samuel P. Taylor State Parks, and Point Reyes National Seashore Association cordially invites you to our 2015 Holiday Open House at the Bear Valley Visitor Center. This a public event in celebration of our local, state and federal parks and marine sanctuaries in West Marin. Come meet park staff and other members of the community. Light refreshments and drinks will be provided by the Point Reyes National Seashore Association. All are welcome and admission is free.  This is a zero-waste event. All efforts will be made to compost and recycle all goods. Please contact John Dell'Osso at 415-464-5135 or by email for more information. To get to the Bear Valley Visitor Center, follow the directions to Point Reyes National Seashore. Celebrating Protection of Public Land and Ocean
